Author: Toscaredtospeak

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,194Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: Kon had changed his perception on what could be classified as sex. It changed more and more as he reflected on himself, the way he wanted to have sex, the way he has had sex, and all the overlap that came with it. So, by his own definition, he and Tim have had sex. Several times in fact. Hell, sometimes when they kissed it felt like sex. Dirty and perfect. Sensual and loving. Open and giving.But that doesn’t change the fact that within what he considers sex, Kon still wanted to do more.He wanted to fuck.The problem was that the universe was adamant that never happened.—Kon and Tim’s almost, almost, and finally, and all the trust, love, and too delicate feelings that come with it.

entry.title: Fragile Things
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,165Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Tim Drake is captured during a failed mission to stop a rising political terrorist group, and subjected to torture. But their attention may be more than just a job to them as one of them seems to have a connection to some old Gotham gangs.Damian Wayne, nursing his own injuries, feels guilty about his role in the kidnapping and enlists his buddy Jon to help him track down Tim. When they cross paths with Jason Todd, who is investigating a potential serial killer, he decides to babysit.Meanwhile, Bruce is out of commission and Dick is feeling the weight of the world and he and Wally chase down some stolen tech, and the Batgirls and Cassie Sandsmark track down some clues, that leads them to a supervillain no one wants to deal with.----The tags apply to the overall theme and content of the story. Please note that at any time during any chapter, such content may appear, and read with your own comfort in mind.This is part one and will contain more hurt than comfort.

entry.title: Chained: To Wield the Blade we have Forged
entry.summary:
Author: Tinerian

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 159,870Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 396

Summary: Now bound together as Master and Submissed, Tim and Jason have nearly omnipotent levels of dangerously unpredictable power at their fingertips. Anyone finding out they hold this power could unravel everything, but the web of lies and secrets they're spinning could destroy them just as easily, and the threat of whatever impending doom prompted the Contract to be made in the first place hangs over their heads like the sword of Damacles.When you hold power over all life and death, how do you decide who not to save?If power is the great corrupter, is it possible for a God to be good?If you put a man in prison for life, would it have been more honest and merciful to slay him with your own two hands?Is a fundamentally evil universe worth preserving?These are the questions that will haunt them, but so too will they be haunted by their love for each other, the wonderful absurdity of joy, goofy ass happenstance, friendship, and lots of playful bickering.Join Tim and Jason on their journey to becoming the ultimate problematic 24/7 BDSM power couple!Estimated final word count: 500,000+

Author: Leoowo

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,946Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 113

Summary: Tim Drake makes a deal. It’s one of the first things you’re taught not to do in Robin training, but Batman should know—Robins never listen.This story explores an alternative way for Tim to bring Bruce back, while discovering something unexpected: love. A path so dangerous and unfathomable that if anyone in his life found out, they’d worry for him more than ever.Tim dealing with emotions and dealing with the things he locked in a box and tried to let rot.
